---

## ⚠️ Important
Do not publish exploit details publicly.  
If this is critical, contact: suporte@mimho.com.br

## Summary
Describe the issue and potential impact.

## Affected Component
What part of the ecosystem is affected? (spec, address registry, website, etc.)

## Evidence / Steps
Provide minimal reproduction details without enabling abuse.

## Suggested Mitigation (optional)
If you have suggestions, include them here.
